definition: the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
surname Guan
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
surname Huai
variant of 備|备[bei4]
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to arrive/most/to/until

sentences.english: To let you know how much your thoughtfulness is appreciated .
sentences.chinese: 告诉你，我多么感谢你对我的关怀备至。

sentences.english: Mother always cares about my studies.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈对我总是关怀备至。

sentences.english: Care, whole-hearted service, we look forward to seeing you.
sentences.chinese: 关怀备至，用心服务，我们期待着您。

sentences.english: Through word honor, he took good care visits.
sentences.chinese: 玥藉词探望荣，关怀备至。

sentences.english: When weather changes or physical discomfort will ask people whether they feel hot, show the utmost solicitude.
sentences.chinese: 逢天气剧变或身体不适便嘘寒问暖，关怀备至。

sentences.english: My friend am bad to me when I am ill.
sentences.chinese: 我生病时我的同学对我关怀备至。

sentences.english: It's like, I think a soccer mom usually is considered a caring parent.
sentences.chinese: 我认为“足球妈妈”是那种关怀备至的家长。

sentences.english: To let you know how much your thoughtfulness is appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 告诉你，我多么感谢你对我关怀备至。

sentences.english: She shows loving care for me and hastens to add more food on my plate until I eat myself sick.
sentences.chinese: 夫人关怀备至，赶紧在盘子里加食，直到我吃得撑死。

definition: to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
in every possible way (idiom); meticulous
to the utmost/in every possible way
to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper
docile and obedient/all obedience
considerate (of other people's needs)
totally submissive (idiom)
extremely (placed after verb or adjective)
to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice/to take sb at his word
to love dearly
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to grant whatever is asked for/to accede to every plea
affable/genial
to welcome sb with a smiling face (idiom)
to show concern and care for
